website_summaries.verdict: Imported product implementing Select Transfer moisture-wicking for optimal comfort.
pros: Select Transfer active moisture aids moisture wicking
3 rear pockets for conveniently carrying water bottles and necessities
cons: A small percentage complained of sizing issues

customer_reviews.title: It's comfortable and just the right weight of polyester to give ...
customer_reviews.text: Well made shirt with a trio of pouches on the back. It's comfortable and just the right weight of polyester to give breathability and durability. My only complaint is that the shoulders are too narrow for me. When I lean forward on my road bike, the sleeve seam is well above the edge of my shoulders and it hurts the aerodynamics a bit. I wish the shoulders were a bit wider as a guy who has 42" shoulders and ordered a large. It's also stinking hard to get something that fits my waist, as I'm a 34" waist. It is surprisingly long enough for me, despite my 6'4" height with a disproportionately long torso.
customer_reviews.author: Brian Cummiskey

customer_reviews.title: No zipper garage results in raw neck
customer_reviews.text: I liked the “club fit” - not too tight on the body. The design was ok, but the lack of a zipper garage was a deal-breaker for me. Any jersey in this price range should have one. In fact, I replaced it with a jersey costing less than half the price and it has a zipper garage. Returned.
customer_reviews.author: [screen_name]

customer_reviews.title: On a Quest for reasonably priced bike gear
customer_reviews.text: I'm on the high side of a large (44 chest), but being tall, I usually buy XL from Pearl Izumi. The body is long enough to cover my backside and loose enough that I don't feel like a bratwurst. And they wick well enough that when I take off after stopping mid-ride, I can feel briefly chilly until it dries. Good stuff!
customer_reviews.author: Steve M

customer_reviews.title: I've lost some weight since I order it so I like the shirt more now but if you're uncomfortable showing ...
customer_reviews.text: I expected it to be baggy based on the reviews; however, it was too close for comfort. I've lost some weight since I order it so I like the shirt more now but if you're uncomfortable showing every roll and curve then I suggest going a size up. The reviews I read did not match this product anymore. The color is great for being seen. The design is fine. The pockets work. I know that might sound silly but I was concerned putting my cell phone in my back pocket but it held my Note 5 very well which is a large phone.
customer_reviews.author: SMEAD

customer_reviews.title: Nice quality - I like the Pearl Izumi products
customer_reviews.text: Comfortable and very bright biking shirt. Exactly what I wanted. People comment that there is no way they couldn't see me. Everything I've bought with the Pearl Izumi brand has been good quality and comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff

customer_reviews.title: Great budget jersey
customer_reviews.text: I'm a huge fan of these Select Quest jerseys. The semi-form fit is perfect- trim, but not suffocatingly tight. Material quality is really good. Not as flashy/exciting of designs as the Select Ltd jerseys, but still nice especially for the price. I have a bunch of the different colors. Really like the shoulder patch, too. Can't go wrong with Pearl Izumi!
customer_reviews.author: Eric H.

customer_reviews.title: I usually wear a size Large for T-shirts, but ...
customer_reviews.text: I usually wear a size Large for T-shirts, but went with an XL here. It fits about the same as my normal athletic shirts in size L.
customer_reviews.author: Mike B

customer_reviews.title: Great jersey for the long haul.
customer_reviews.text: Writing this review after clocking more than 250 kms on my bike. The fit was perfect, initially worried that the size would run a size smaller than what i have ordered.Then after wearing it,the doubts slowly faded away giving way to a mild surprise. The jersey wicks away the sweat as quickly as it accumalates. So,Count me among the countless fans of Pearl izumi merchandise. Overall a gr8 product&an effortless service both from Amazon and as well as from the seller,especially me ordering it from india.
customer_reviews.author: jag

customer_reviews.title: Pearl Izumi has never disappointed me.
customer_reviews.text: This is a pretty sweet jersey. It has a higher quality feel than the off brand jerseys I've bought in the past in that it has good shape. The fit is perfect, and doesn't seem restrictive at any point. I bought the Port/Black jersey. The colors are deep and rich. Although my jersey is new, I feel that I'll get good long time use out of it.
customer_reviews.author: RMA626

customer_reviews.title: Fine but better out there for the price
customer_reviews.text: Fine for the price I paid but way better bike jerseys out there, for instance, the Performance Elite. Bought because of Izumi name but wouldn't buy again.
customer_reviews.author: J. Pan

customer_reviews.title: Reasonably priced, good fit and comfortable
customer_reviews.text: I've only worn the jersey a couple of times since spring started, but no problems so far. To date, my Pearl Izumi clothes purchases haven't been disappointing, and am very pleased with their products that I own. I look forward to adding to my cycling wardrobe as the weather warms up!
customer_reviews.author: Boston, MA

customer_reviews.title: Buy one size smaller then usual (see manf. website).
customer_reviews.text: Amazon size chart not that helpful but the iZumi site does suggest that for the Select line, buy one size smaller than you usually wear which is the right thing. I also purchased a long sleeve iZumi shirt (first time my size XL but it was too big and large fit). I am 6 foot 182 lbs.
customer_reviews.author: Greg P.

customer_reviews.title: Good for the Money
customer_reviews.text: I wear a size M in almost all shirts (5'8", 150lbs, fairly rounded chest). While this jersey is a good fit in the chest area, it is baggy in the arms and waist. I was expecting a looser fit from the description, but the sleeves are baggy enough to be irritating while riding. This could of course be my fault for not ordering a small. The materials and styling are quality for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Jake Holt

customer_reviews.title: Usually wear medium, but needed large. UPF?
customer_reviews.text: I am 5'10" and 155lbs. The medium was skin tight so I got a large which was just right. Description says upf 40 on Amazon, but is not mentioned on the tags that come with shirt as usual when a product has sunblock capability.
customer_reviews.author: MO

customer_reviews.title: Good quality
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my father and he loves it - size medium and he is about 5'7ish and 140 pounds. A small would be skin tight if that is what you prefer. This fits more like a fitted shirt similar to what the image on Amazon displays.
customer_reviews.author: Andrea

customer_reviews.title: This is a great shirt for the price
customer_reviews.text: I just started road biking so I was looking for something cheap yet would still make me visible on the road. I bought a Medium because I normally wear Medium/Large shirts. This fits well, just a little short lengthwise. I notice myself having to pull it down while biking. The material is smooth and soft, seems to absorb sweat well. This is a great shirt for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Chi Yang

customer_reviews.title: Ex-racer loves the fit and comfort
customer_reviews.text: Bought as a gift for my husband, who no longer races and wanted to stop wearing team clothing and looking like a wanna be. It fits his slightly larger than it used to be waist much better than his old racing togs. He loves it.
customer_reviews.author: Lillian

customer_reviews.title: Go For It
customer_reviews.text: You can't go wrong with this jersey. The fabric wicks away sweat while maintaining its shape. Definitely not a loose jersey by any means, but not compression either; a good middle-ground between the two extremes.
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: Not a bad jersey.
customer_reviews.text: It is okay. My biggest issue is having paid less money for another jersey that I like better. The color is as expected. Material is okay. Wash in protecting laundry bag to avoid material snags. I would buy again, but I would be much happier if it was a bit less expensive.
customer_reviews.author: E. J.

customer_reviews.title: I ordered one XXL just to judge fit and it was perfect; I immediately ordered three more of various colors
customer_reviews.text: I am 5'9" and am currently rolling at 240lbs (down almost 20lbs since March; WOO WOO). I ordered one XXL just to judge fit and it was perfect; I immediately ordered three more of various colors. when fully zipped the neck is a wee snug. while not a problem for me I know some folks that may be turned off by that. I would say it is no more snug than a well fitting mock turtle neck.
customer_reviews.author: D. Rayla

customer_reviews.title: Great fit and unique color
customer_reviews.text: Good price and perfect fit. I bought this for an organized ride in Green Bay on a hot August weekend and it fit well and kept me cool (as much as possible anyway).
customer_reviews.author: Bill O'

customer_reviews.title: Great for Cycling
customer_reviews.text: Amazon had the style and color of cycling shirt that I wanted. It was delivered to my front door with no fuss and muss. The shirt fit perfectly. It is comfortable. It met my expectations.
customer_reviews.author: Paul Smith

customer_reviews.title: First biking jersey and it was every I expected. ...
customer_reviews.text: First biking jersey and it was every I expected. 6'3" 195 lbs athletic build and the large fit me, slightly on the baggier side (I was expecting a really snug fit). However I think a medium would have been too small.
customer_reviews.author: Brad

customer_reviews.title: Seams like the quality of the fabric is cheaper than my ...
customer_reviews.text: Seams like the quality of the fabric is cheaper than my previous PI shirts. Getting fuzzy where my camel back straps are. Had to order size larger to get a good fit.
customer_reviews.author: ConsumerJoe

customer_reviews.title: It's a little baggier than I might like, but that was the right call as a ...
customer_reviews.text: I ordered a size larger than I do for my dress shirts as I didn't want such a tight fit to show every buldge. It's a little baggier than I might like, but that was the right call as a size smaller (my normal dressing size) would have been a contoured fit.
customer_reviews.author: David A Walker

customer_reviews.title: Nice jersey!
customer_reviews.text: Super comfy and not a snug fit. Won't look like a MAMIL in this jersey! Will buy again!
customer_reviews.author: Biquey

customer_reviews.title: Great value and quality
customer_reviews.text: Fits really well, great material, very comfortable. I love it. And a great price for something so high quality
customer_reviews.author: NewMidwesterner

customer_reviews.title: Good fit, good design.
customer_reviews.text: I'm a shorter guy (5'7") with big shoulders, so I'm always nervous buying clothes online. But this Jersey fit great! It would be equally comfortable for someone a little bigger or smaller than me too. The design helps keep me warm on cooler rides, and cool on warmer rides. Looks nice too.
customer_reviews.author: matt

customer_reviews.title: Good looking jersey
customer_reviews.text: Love the color and the feel. Typical high quality Pearl Izumi product. Sharp design - I get many compliments! Fits well - I'm a small framed but solid guy (5'6", 160 lbs, 38" chest) and purchased a medium, which I typically do for bike jerseys, so the fit was as expected. Bought two more, I liked it so much.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Really like it.
customer_reviews.text: I really like this jersey. I do not like form fitting jerseys and this one fits a little loose which is a good thing for me. I think they run big compared to other jerseys I have. Nice and bright. Too many nut jobs on the road. This bright color helps keep riders safe.
customer_reviews.author: Anonymous won

customer_reviews.title: which I enjoyed the extra room
customer_reviews.text: Fits more loosely than most cycling jersey, which I enjoyed the extra room.
customer_reviews.author: Michael R.

customer_reviews.title: Excellent all around jersey for riding and commuting
customer_reviews.text: Good looking, not overly form fitting jersey. This is perfect for commuting and general rides.
customer_reviews.author: Mjolnir. PMA

customer_reviews.title: Fit, construction, and quality of fabric.
customer_reviews.text: Outstanding cycling shirt. Pearl Izumi does not disappoint with this jersey. My go to for everyday riding. I have two.
customer_reviews.author: Kenneth E. Kimble

customer_reviews.title: Breathable, comfortable
customer_reviews.text: The ideal bike jersey. Really comfortable and breathable. Fit as expected. Bright colors for safety. High quality fabric and sewing.
customer_reviews.author: Michael

customer_reviews.title: Good Durability.
customer_reviews.text: Fair Shirt. Used it for about half a year. Ride once a week. Wash it every time I bike. Still in great condition.
customer_reviews.author: Jim Liu

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great fit and feel. Not too tight like many other tops
customer_reviews.author: RPH

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Well made shirt. Holds up well to wash and daily use.
customer_reviews.author: John

customer_reviews.title: Not perfect fit in XXL
customer_reviews.text: Really really comfortable, and very good looking. However, I have noticed that Pearl Izumi products tend to fit somewhat smaller in the XXL sizes. I wish it was a little bit longer, because when I'm not riding, it tends to go up a little bit and show my belly button. Still, I love it, and I'm losing weight so, hopefully will fit better in the future.
customer_reviews.author: Javier Estrada

customer_reviews.title: I don't like the cut of the new version.
customer_reviews.text: I have an older version of this jersey from 2 or 3 years ago and I love it. The cut of the new version is completely different. It's much more of an athletic fit. I'm a slim guy, so I'm OK with it being a little snugger, but on the bike, it's tight around the back and rides up to the point where I keep tugging it down. I would say that the material is nicer than the old version, so if this fits, then maybe others will love it.
customer_reviews.author: Ben Mills

customer_reviews.title: Fit is a little unusual but I like it
customer_reviews.text: This jersey is a little big in the body and a little small in the shoulders but I can wear it and enjoy it. It feels great and. looks like typical great PI quality
customer_reviews.author: PLS

customer_reviews.title: It will be fine though.
customer_reviews.text: It's an OK jersey. I normally wear a size medium in cycling jerseys. This one seems just a little bit smaller than my normal size. It will be fine though.
customer_reviews.author: Waldo

customer_reviews.title: Sale price made it a good choice as well
customer_reviews.text: This was a gift and so far the recipient says it performs well on his rides. Sizing was accurate. Sale price made it a good choice as well.
customer_reviews.author: Margaret

customer_reviews.title: A bit disappointed
customer_reviews.text: Well I bought the wasabi Jersey also which was perfect. While this was a lose and long . . May be they could reconsider the length .... My sizeing was perfect but the closes to my chest and waist was very long .
customer_reviews.author: B

customer_reviews.title: Arms are slightly small but not bad. To be fair
customer_reviews.text: Arms are slightly small but not bad. To be fair, I have larger arms than most. As long as the jersey holds up to wear and tear, I'm happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: Timothy Ward

customer_reviews.title: 5-3 hours and the jersey is still in good shape with all the washes and wear and tear
customer_reviews.text: Durable. I've been on 20+ MTB rides that last for 1.5-3 hours and the jersey is still in good shape with all the washes and wear and tear.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: but it fits like an athletic shirt should fit
customer_reviews.text: I'm a big guy 6'1" and weigh 230. I didn't want form fitting clothes. I purchased XL and fits me near perfectly. It's a bit long, but I'd rather have long than tight. It's not as loose as a t shirt, but it fits like an athletic shirt should fit.
customer_reviews.author: Jim

customer_reviews.title: Great deal
customer_reviews.text: Pearl izumi makes great products for the price, this one is no different. I'm not a large guy, but I'm tall and skinny: 6'2" 175lbs and a size L fits snug.
customer_reviews.author: A. Calcagni

customer_reviews.title: super visible on the road
customer_reviews.text: Gret shirt, dries quickly, super visible on the road, colors NOT fading after few laundries
customer_reviews.author: Amnon Feiner

customer_reviews.title: Great shirt for the $
customer_reviews.text: Wish it was full zip, but great jersey for the $. Is NOT a super tight euro-fit shirt either, which is nice.
customer_reviews.author: A. Matthews

customer_reviews.title: Great jersey!
customer_reviews.text: I wanted extra large to have some room. The sleeves are very short IMO. That being said this is a great jersey.
customer_reviews.author: WLG

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Item received as expected, on time and without any problems
customer_reviews.author: Wallace Bowman

customer_reviews.title: Very nice!
customer_reviews.text: Well, we want to look ripped - so it should be fitting (somewhat small), right? But it's not overly so... Looks sharp, great quality,
customer_reviews.author: MarkInSJC

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Fits fell, not too tight, long enough in the back to suit ridding.
customer_reviews.author: Nicholas Payne

customer_reviews.title: Pearl Izumi Short Sleeve Biking Shirt
customer_reviews.text: Pearl Izumi makes excellent products and this is no exception.
customer_reviews.author: Don S.

customer_reviews.title: Nice back up Jersey
customer_reviews.text: I wish it was a full zip but then I would have had to pay more for it if it were. Fits good though and is a great back up jersey.
customer_reviews.author: Rob

customer_reviews.title: This jersey is comfortable, light weight
customer_reviews.text: Riding on surface streets, bright colors are a must. This jersey is comfortable, light weight, and has held up to washing and regular use/wearing.
customer_reviews.author: Sailor James

customer_reviews.title: took long to get it and even longer to return ...
customer_reviews.text: took long to get it and even longer to return it.. Product was as described just too small. Pearl Izumi does run small.
customer_reviews.author: Deborah

customer_reviews.title: Love the sky blue color
customer_reviews.text: Love the sky blue color, little snug through the midsection (but that's probably the burger I ate for lunch vs the cut)
customer_reviews.author: randumtasx

customer_reviews.title: Low quality
customer_reviews.text: Poor quality, balling up on inner thigh after three rides, and loose threads on stitching, pearl izumi was once a quality local company in CO-now cheap crap made in China
customer_reviews.author: Anton

customer_reviews.title: Good shirt with meh pockets
customer_reviews.text: Solid jersey but I returned it because the back pockets would slouch when I put things in them.
customer_reviews.author: uhnonimuss

customer_reviews.title: Great bright jersey at super price. Buy more than 1.
customer_reviews.text: Top quality jersey at an unbelievable price. I should have bought 2 more.
customer_reviews.author: Chaz

customer_reviews.title: The XL fits me loosely but it nice and comfy
customer_reviews.text: i'm 6'1 210 lbs with bigger arms. The XL fits me loosely but it nice and comfy. I really like this Jersey
customer_reviews.author: David Main

customer_reviews.title: i like this style
customer_reviews.text: i like this style. will get more in different color. I'm 5'6 140lbs and it's not as tight at cycling jerseys
customer_reviews.author: BukLao

customer_reviews.title: Good comfortable jersey
customer_reviews.text: I found one of these locally and so I know how it fits. I've got a 43 inch chest, 38 inch waste at belly button and 16" arms and the large fits me great.
customer_reviews.author: Joey Styles

customer_reviews.title: Great jersey!
customer_reviews.text: No negatives from me on this jersey. Fit is perfect, I’m 6’3”, the xxl fits great, not baggy, not too long. It’s well made, is comfortable and looks great.
customer_reviews.author: Kenneth Son

customer_reviews.title: Great jersey for the price
customer_reviews.text: Great fitting and inexpensive Jersey. Bought a second one in blue.
customer_reviews.author: Spider Dijon

customer_reviews.title: sun resisting
customer_reviews.text: Minimum color means minimum heat gain from the sun. Nicely made.
customer_reviews.author: Clement

customer_reviews.title: Great for everyday riding.
customer_reviews.text: This is my go-to jersey for riding - great fit and durability. The fabric in the updated version is slightly better on warmer days.
customer_reviews.author: B. Campbell

customer_reviews.title: Light comfortable and good colors
customer_reviews.text: Light comfortable and good colors. I have converted to Pearl Izumi for the last year or so. All of their bike stuff seems well thought out and is reasonably priced.
customer_reviews.author: Dr Dave

customer_reviews.title: Nice plain jersey.
customer_reviews.text: A very good price for a simple, plain, and bright jersey. I bought XXL and it fits perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: AnaheimGary

customer_reviews.title: Excellent quality
customer_reviews.text: Same jersey in different color purchased three years ago, with same reliable sizing and quality.
customer_reviews.author: Richard Kagan

customer_reviews.title: 3 pockets don't leave you snookered.
customer_reviews.text: All around great. 3 pockets are fantastic. Fits well. Wicks nicely, visible.
customer_reviews.author: M. English

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great material. Fit as expected. Little hard to take off after sweating because this is not full zip
customer_reviews.author: hansoo

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: A little pricy at $55 but I like the bright yellow.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice
customer_reviews.text: Nice color and comfortable. Fits as stated which is unusual for cycling jerseys.
customer_reviews.author: Ted

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very nice, I prefer the zipper over a pull over
customer_reviews.author: Average Joe

customer_reviews.title: Great quality shirt
customer_reviews.text: Great quality shirt, but I would recommend buying the next size up from whatever size you would normally wear or it will be far too tight.
customer_reviews.author: Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice comfortable fit
customer_reviews.text: Nice comfortable fit. Good quality. Unlike some bike shirts, was not tight overly fitted or tight on me (large size).
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Sizing is small. Get a size larger than you'd ...
customer_reviews.text: Sizing is small. Get a size larger than you'd normally weak. Zipper uncomfortable in the neck area.
customer_reviews.author: KM

customer_reviews.title: It's ok--nothing special
customer_reviews.text: It's ok. This is part of the entry level gear of Pearl Izumi. Nothing spectacular about it. Just a nice jersey.
customer_reviews.author: Tzeitel Gutierrez

customer_reviews.title: Great value!
customer_reviews.text: Purchased the screaming yellow Jersey for visibility. The material is great and it was a great value.
customer_reviews.author: SAO

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Fit as expected, pockets roomy enough for protein bars or a wallet but not baggy.
customer_reviews.author: Philip Saynisch

customer_reviews.title: Good for hot temperature rides and good quality
customer_reviews.text: Summer weight fabric is lighter and cooler than standard road bike shirts
customer_reviews.author: Blair

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Good product at least not a fake. THANKS TO AMAZON.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: A little short
customer_reviews.text: The length is a little short and the pockets are small.
customer_reviews.author: Greg

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I love this jersey. Just what I wanted for a hot summer ride.
customer_reviews.author: Doug

customer_reviews.title: He wears an xl in tshirts and is about 190lbs and he said he loved the fit
customer_reviews.text: Bought this as a gift for my dad. He wears an xl in tshirts and is about 190lbs and he said he loved the fit!
customer_reviews.author: Diane Schaefer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Fits great, good build and keeps you nice and cool!
customer_reviews.author: z

customer_reviews.title: Great jersey
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable and lightweight. Fits almost perfectly for the size.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: fits much better..
customer_reviews.text: I bought another Pearl , same size , fits much better ...
customer_reviews.author: Maddog

customer_reviews.title: Great comfortable Jersey
customer_reviews.text: Comfortable, light, soft. Large fits a little tighter than a t shirt, not skin tight though. I'm 5'11 and 185 lbs. Looks sharp.
customer_reviews.author: Sawyer Stone

customer_reviews.title: The quality really is good for the price The zipper feels great too
customer_reviews.text: I've wore the shirt about 5 times already. The quality really is good for the price The zipper feels great too. I would not hesitate to recommend this to someone.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Super bright/visible. Makes me feel a little more comfortable ...
customer_reviews.text: Fits as expected. High quality construction/material. Super bright/visible. Makes me feel a little more comfortable on busy roads.
customer_reviews.author: charles a chmielewski

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I liked the first one so much that I bought a second. Great shirt.
customer_reviews.author: Dave

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I like this bike shirt so much I bought another one. Super light weight. Plus they were half off.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: So I ordered a large and it fit great.
customer_reviews.text: I wear medium normally, but I know this product runs small. So I ordered a large and it fit great.
customer_reviews.author: Cheryl Connor

customer_reviews.title: Shirt too short for tall people
customer_reviews.text: If you are tall & slim and wear medium size, this will be short for you.
customer_reviews.author: myko

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Came in time for Christmas, and I think it was well received.
customer_reviews.author: spotz51

customer_reviews.title: Great looking jersey.
customer_reviews.text: Love the way this jersey fits. I'm 6'1 197 lbs and I went for the Large. It's pretty snug on the chest, shoulders, and arms but that's what I would expect a bike jersey to fit like. Really comfie on rides. I wish it was just a hair taller. I have a pretty long torso and it's right at the edge of almost popping up in the back while I'm riding. Edit: I ended up getting a second in another color and it fits and looks as great as the first. Highly recommended jersey.
customer_reviews.author: James Samuel Jackson

customer_reviews.title: Saved me some road rash
customer_reviews.text: Meds fit well and stays in place. Would buy again. Went down with them on. Kept the road rash to a minimum.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon User #313

product_meta.title: Pearl Izumi Men's Select Short Sleeve Quest Jersey
product_meta.description: Make the leap into traditional cycling apparel and experience the crafted comfort of sporty, sweat-wicking fabric in this high-tech yet budget-friendly jersey.
feature_bullets: SELECT transfer fabric sets the benchmark for moisture transfer
